did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: A Guide to the Dr. James W. McClung Account Book, 1858-1862

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Dr. James W. McClung Account Book, 1858-1862. Local Government Records Collection, Rockbridge County Court Records, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia in a transfer of court papers from Rockbridge County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Dr. James W. McClung was a physician who practiced medicine in Rockbridge County during the mid-nineteenth century.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Account book, 1858-1862, of James W. McClung, a physician. It records the accounts of individual patients including African-Americans. Each account lists dates of transactions and charges and payments for visits to patients, medication, and other medical services such as extracting teeth, removing warts, and obstetrical surgery.
